Package org.apache.http.impl.nio.codecs

Default implementations for interfaces in org.apache.http.nio.codecs.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AbstractContentDecoder Abstract ContentDecoder that serves as a base for all content decoder implementations.
AbstractContentEncoder Abstract ContentEncoder that serves as a base for all content encoder implementations.
AbstractMessageParser Abstract NHttpMessageParser that serves as a base for all message parser implementations.
AbstractMessageWriter Abstract NHttpMessageWriter that serves as a base for all message writer implementations.
ChunkDecoder Implements chunked transfer coding.
ChunkEncoder Implements chunked transfer coding.
HttpRequestParser Default NHttpMessageParser implementation for HttpRequests.
HttpRequestWriter Default NHttpMessageWriter implementation for HttpRequests.
HttpResponseParser Default NHttpMessageParser implementation for HttpResponses.
HttpResponseWriter Default NHttpMessageWriter implementation for HttpResponses.
IdentityDecoder Content decoder that reads data without any transformation.
IdentityEncoder Content encoder that writes data without any transformation.
LengthDelimitedDecoder Content decoder that cuts off after a defined number of bytes.
LengthDelimitedEncoder Content encoder that cuts off after a defined number of bytes.
 

Package org.apache.http.impl.nio.codecs Description

Default implementations for interfaces in org.apache.http.nio.codecs.
There are implementations of the transport encodings used by HTTP, in particular the chunked coding for sending and receiving entities.
